channel.title: Please help !@@@###$$$$$
channel.description: please help me i am tryin to make my own server but it says in one step to type my router ip addres in th address bar and what if i dont have a router....if i do where would i find the routers ip???please answer asap!!!!!!!!

item.title: Please help !@@@###$$$$$
item.dc:creator: @imickhunt imickhunt
item.description:
@imickhunt wrote:

because then i can help him better… usually you only have a router if your using Broadband. Dialup uses a Modem.

but then again there is a time saving option… Start -> run -> “command.com” without the ". then type whats in the code box below

ipconfig /all

Windows IP Configuration

    Host Name . . . . . . . . . . . . : **********
    Primary Dns Suffix  . . . . . . . :
    Node Type . . . . . . . . . . . . : Hybrid
    IP Routing Enabled. . . . . . . . : No
    WINS Proxy Enabled. . . . . . . . : No
    DNS Suffix Search List. . . . . . : home

Ethernet adapter Local Area Connection:

    Connection-specific DNS Suffix  . : home
    Description . . . . . . . . . . . : Realtek RTL8139 Family PCI Fast Ethe

rnet NIC
Physical Address. . . . . . . . . : 00-50-FC-FB-39-93
Dhcp Enabled. . . . . . . . . . . : Yes
Autoconfiguration Enabled . . . . : Yes
IP Address. . . . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.1.64 <------- that one is your router Ip address if via ethernet
Subnet Mask . . . . . . . . . . . : 255.255.255.0
Default Gateway . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.1.254
DHCP Server . . . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.1.254
DNS Servers . . . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.1.254
Lease Obtained. . . . . . . . . . : 02 January 2007 23:08:58
Lease Expires . . . . . . . . . . : 03 January 2007 23:08:58

If you cannot work it out, then right click the Command window, select all, then hit return and paste it in a code box for me
